name: indentation
content:
indentation noun
(HOLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a hole or mark on the surface of something: The heels of her shoes had left indentations in the mud.

indentation noun
(SPACE)
[ C or U ] a space left at the edge of a line of writing, or the process of leaving such a space

a part of a surface that curves inward: If a surgeon takes out too much fat, he may leave indentations in the skin.
